summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cloud Watcher MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional (21/21 tests passed), but frontend has critical Select component bugs preventing proper form functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: React runtime error: Select.Item must have non-empty string value prop
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents form submissions, breaks filtering functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Credential fields not rendering after provider selection
ui_bugs.impact: Cannot add cloud accounts with credentials

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts pointer events preventing navigation
ui_bugs.impact: Navigation blocked when dialogs are open

integration_issues.issue: Form submission disabled due to missing credential fields

passed_tests: All CRUD operations for cloud accounts
Basic page navigation (when no modals open)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical Select component bugs: 1) Remove empty string values from SelectItem components in CloudAccounts.jsx, Inventory.jsx, and Recommendations.jsx. 2) Fix credential field rendering logic in CloudAccounts form. 3) Fix modal overlay z-index issues preventing navigation.
